title: Enhancing HR Management Practical Competencies: Collaborative Learning Project for Creating Pharmacology Infographics

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary pharmacology concepts and understanding of drug action mechanisms
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Collaboratively design two types of infographics that systematically convey core pharmacological concepts integrated with visual elements
Analyze infographics' information comprehensibility, visualization effectiveness, and academic accuracy using a 5-point scale evaluation rubric from peers and instructors
Demonstrate integrated mastery of theoretical knowledge and infographic production skills by achieving over 70% proficiency in official assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
